<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can have unintended consequences.  The function InvalidateInstruction-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cache uses instructions dcbf and icbi, both of which are treated by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the processor as loads.  If the page has no read permissions,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;arm&#95;&#95;) || defined(&#95;&#95;aarch64&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Certain ARM implementations treat icache clear instruction as a memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// read, and CPU segfaults on trying to clear cache on !PROT&#95;READ page.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore we need to temporarily add PROT&#95;READ for the sake of flushing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction caches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InvalidateCache &amp;&amp; !(Protect &amp; PROT&#95;READ)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Result != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InvalidateInstructionCache - Before the JIT can run a block of code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that has been emitted it must invalidate the instruction cache on some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// platforms.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory/#a5cfd4d2a8227a3f9ca0667f42f05f20b">Memory::InvalidateInstructionCache</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Addr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Len) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// icache invalidation for PPC and ARM.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;APPLE&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if (defined(&#95;&#95;powerpc&#95;&#95;) || defined(&#95;&#95;arm&#95;&#95;) || defined(&#95;&#95;arm64&#95;&#95;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  sys&#95;icache&#95;invalidate(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Addr), Len);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#elif defined(&#95;&#95;Fuchsia&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  zx&#95;status&#95;t Status = zx&#95;cache&#95;flush(Addr, Len, ZX&#95;CACHE&#95;FLUSH&#95;INSN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Status == ZX&#95;OK &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;cannot invalidate instruction cache&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
